text:
*Question Tips for your Mentee!*
<!everyone> If you're stuck for ideas of what to ask your Mentee, why not ask them:
```• What problems in the world are you passionate about solving?
• What would you do if you knew you couldn't fail?
• When are you happiest and most excited?
• What do you think are you strengths and weaknesses?
• What motivates and inspires you?```

and I'm sure you'll have many more questions when they answer those!
